_GLIBCXX_VISIBILITY() _GLIBCXX_VISIBILITYbasic_ios.h basic_ios.h_GLIBCXX_VISIBILITY
namespace std _GLIBCXX_VISIBILITY (default )
Template class basic_ios, virtual base class for all stream classes.
Template Parameters
_CharT
Type of character stream.
_Traits
Traits for character type, defaults to char_traits<_CharT>.
Most of the member functions called dispatched on stream objects (e.g., std::cout.foo(bar);) are consolidated in this class.
These are standard types. They permit a standardized way of referring to names of (or names dependent on) the template parameters, which are specific to the implementation. Here is the call graph for this function:
